argonDash

argon dashboard template

Installation

install.packages("argonR")
# devel version
devtools::install_github("RinteRface/argonDash")
# from CRAN
install.packages("argonDash")

Demo

See a demonstration on an open source shiny server here. In addition to free RStudio products, argonDash also runs on shinyapps.io and RStudio Connect, as well as on shiny server pro.

argonDashGallery()

Vertical layout


Horizontal layout

This layout is experimental.
